lead_paragraph: Formula One drivers are calling for a new safety device to be installed in their cockpits from 2017, hoping the so-called "halo" will prevent the lethal threat posed by flying debris.

headline.print_headline: F1 Drivers Want Cockpit Safety Device for 2017
headline.main: F1 Drivers Want Cockpit Safety Device for 2017

snippet: Formula One drivers are calling for a new safety device to be installed in their cockpits from 2017, hoping the so-called "halo" will prevent the lethal threat posed by flying debris....
